NightStrike::

NighStrike:

Nighstrike opened fire against Zardus.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Surgital/Triggerhappy/Cutthroat/Skullgrin::
> 
>      Surgital got hit in the back, and turned around in fury to 
look at Greven.  With another blade regrown in his right hand, he 
lifted it, and then sent the saw blade from his hand quickly at 
Greven's shoulder.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Triggerhappy dodged one missile but the other hit the ground 
and exploded near him, and sent him flying into a boulder.  He got 
up, then transformed to jet mode, and darted up into the air, towards 
Astral, attempting to ram Astral.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>          Cutthroat flew out of the way of the grenades.  He flew 
around searching for another target, as the jet went out of his 
sights.  Cutthroat shot a stream of fire from his beak down at Hun-
Grr, mistaking him for a Maximal from how high up he was.
